RESET_PASSWORD_NOTIF: Your password is empty or has been reset. Please choose another one :
NOTIF_ERROR_GETTING_ACCOUNT_INFO: Unable to get your account information.
NOTIF_ERROR_UPDATING_USER_INFO: An error occurred while updating your user account.
NOTIF_INCORRECT_PASSWORD: The specified password is not correct.
NOTIF_ERROR_UPDATING_PASSWORD: An error occurred while updating your password.
NOTIF_ERROR_GETTING_OLD_LOG: Unable to access older log files.
NOTIF_ERROR_DURING_SERVER_UPDATE: An error occurred while updating the server.
NOTIF_CONNECTION_LOST: Unable to connect to the following server(s) : {{ serverlist }}
NOTIF_ERROR_GETTING_USER_LIST: Unable to access the list of users.
NOTIF_ERROR_DELETING_USER: An error occurred while deleting the user.
NOTIF_ERROR_RESETING_PASSWORD: An error occurred while reseting the password.
NOTIF_ERROR_UPDATING_USER: An error occurred while updating the user.
NOTIF_ERROR_ADDING_USER: An error occurred while adding the new user.
CONFIRM_HANDLE_ALARM: Are you sure you want to acknowledge the alarm?
CONFIRM_HANDLE_ALL: Are you sure you want to acknowledge all the alarms?
CONFIRM_HANDLED: The selected alarm has been acknowleged.
CONFIRM_HANDLE_SELECTED: Are you sure you want to acknowledge all the selected alarms?
CONRIM_DELETE_SERVER: Are you sure you want to delete the server?
CONFIRM_DELETE_USER: Are you sure you want to delete the user {{ username }}?
CONFIRM_RESET_PASSWORD: Are you sure you want to reset {{ username }}'s password?
NOTIF_ERROR_GETTING_SERVER_LIST: Unable to access the list of servers.
NOTIF_ERROR_DELETING_SERVER: An error occurred while deleting the server.
NOTIF_ERROR_ADDING_SERVER: An error occurred while adding the new server.
NOTIF_ERROR_UPDATING_SERVER: An error occurred while updating the server.
NOTIF_ERROR_GETTING_SITE_LIST: Unable to access the list of sites. You should try to reload the page to be able to use filters.
NOTIF_ERROR_GETTING_CAMERA_LIST: Unable to access the list of cameras. You should try to reload the page to be able to use filters.
NOTIF_ERROR_GETTING_ALARMS: An error occurred while accessing the list of alarms.
NOTIF_ERROR_MARK_HANDLED: An error occurred, the alarms could not be acknowledged.
HELP_CLICK_ALL_ALARMS_TAB: You are currently viewing alarms that have not been acknowledged. Click on this tab to see the list of all alarms
HELP_LANGUAGE: You can change the language with this button
HELP_ALARMTABLE_CHECKBOX: Select several alarms to quickly acknowledge them
HELP_PLAYER: When you select an alarm, the corresponding video is displayed here
HELP_CLICK_NOT_HANDLED_ALARMS_TAB: You are currently viewing all the alarms. Click on this tab to only display alarms that have not been acknowledged yet
HELP_FILTERS: By default only alarms created today are shown. Use these fields to define which alarms you want to display
HELP_COLLAPSE_LIVE_PANEL: Click on a site to show or hide the available cameras
HELP_FULLSCREEN: Click here to show an enlarged video player for this camera
HELP_PREVIOUS_CAMERA: Click here to switch to the previous camera
HELP_NEXT_CAMERA: Click here to switch to the next camera
HELP_CLOSE_PLAYER: Click here to close the player
HELP_ACCOUNT_SETTINGS: Use this page to update account information
HELP_NEWSERVER: Click here to add a new server
HELP_SELECT_SERVER: Click on a line to update server information
HELP_COMMIT_NEWSERVER: Fill in the fields and validate to connect to the new server
HELP_COMMIT_CURRENTSERVER: Type your modifications and validate to update the server
HELP_NEWUSER: Click here to add a new user
HELP_SELECT_USER: Click on a line to update user information
HELP_COMMIT_CURRENTUSER: Type your modifications and validate to update the user
HELP_COMMIT_NEWUSER: Fill in the fields and validate to create a new user
HELP_RESET_PASSWORD: Use this column if you wish to reset the password of another user. He will be asked to choose a new password the next time he logs in.
NOTIF_ERROR_GETTING_CAMERAS: Unable to get the list of available cameras
HELP_LIVE_NO_CAMERAS: No available cameras were detected for live video. Try connecting to a server using the "Servers" page.
NOTIF_INVALID_IP_ADDRESS: Please enter a valid IP address
NOTIF_INVALID_DATE_FORMAT: The specified date is invalid. The expected format is yyyy-mm-dd
AUTH_FAILURE: The username or password is incorrect
HELP_OSD: Use this button to show or hide the OSD
HELP_ACK_ALL: Click here to acknowledge all the alarms.
